1.0.name: wordpress/testimonial-slider
1.0.description:
Testimonial Slider is a plugin for WordPress that will help you show the Testimonials submitted by your Happy Customers in a clean and beautiful Slider format. The "Testimonials" are a Custom Post Type. You can enter the Customer's Image/Avatar, Name, Company, Website in the Custom Fields for the Testimonial and the actual Testimonial text in the "Description". It is as simple as that!

Features:

  • Add only specific "Testimonials" to Custom Slider
  • Show "Category" specific Testimonials
  • Show "Recent" testimonials
  • Shortcodes and Widgets available
  • Multiple Sliders, Multiple Settings and Multiple transition effects supported.
